Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/33rd
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/33rd.

  • Northbound buses will operate via State, 33rd, King Drive, 26th, then resume their normal route on State.
  • Southbound buses will operate via State, 26th, Michigan, 333rd, then resume their normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Northwest Highway/Devon
ShortDescription: Southbound #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Ozark, Ozanam, Devon and Northwest Highway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Ozark, Ozanam, Devon and Northwest Highway due to street blockage near Northwest Highway/Devon.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
